page.title: 12LADIES GUILD, GOBOWEN
page.content: New members always welcome at the meetings of Gobowen Ladies Guild, held at 7.45 p.m. on the second Thursday of each month in All Saints Church Hall. The April 1985 meeting included a most interesting and unusual talk, with slides, on chocolate and cocoa,given by Mr G.Shrimpton. Refreshments followed and arrangements were discussed for a June outing and meal at the Tri-Thy-Craft Centre near Mold, Clwyd. The May meeting will be a joint evening with the Mothers' Union, when Mrs. Smith will speak on the work of the M.U. There will be a bring and buy stall, and refreshments will be served. Extract from village magazine. GOBOWEN ROUNDABOUT
